amendment.description: To amend the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act to prohibit pre-existing condition exclusions.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2673 withdrawn in Senate.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Motion to table amendment SA 2673 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 199.

Amendment SA 2673 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 2652. (consideration: CR S5923-5924; text: CR S5987-5990) To amend the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act to prohibit pre-existing condition exclusions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2673 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 2652.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2673 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 199.
